article: How to Start Living Your Best Life Today
intro: "Live your best life." These four simple words, made famous by Oprah Winfrey, make a path to happiness seem clear-cut and simple. However, things can get in the way of you living your best life—fatigue, burnout, social media pressure, other people’s opinions…the list goes on. And we get it—on top of everything you have to juggle in life, the last thing you want to do is add another thing to your plate. In this article, we make it easy for you! We've also interviewed professional life coaches for their expert insight on how to start living your best life

points.name: 12 Ways to Live Your Best Life

steps.title: Reach out to a counselor or life coach.
steps.subtitle: or  can lower your stress and anxiety levels, as well as give you more confidence in your decisions. These professionals are trained to help you be more self-aware, which allows you to be more present and mindful in your life.
sub-points: Certified life coach Tracey Rogers has observed that many people want to make life changes but simply don’t know where to begin.
“A life coach can be really beneficial,” Rogers asserts, “because you’ll have an outside objective perspective that can keep you focused and…someone who is literally on your team.”

points.name: Figuring Out What Your Best Life Looks Like

steps.title: Visualize what your best life will look like.
steps.subtitle: Choose a specific intention or outcome you want to work toward and consider how you’ll feel when you’ve accomplished it. Allow your mind to wander and fully  what that version of yourself will look like. Include sensory images using all 5 of your senses.
sub-points: Try to answer these questions: what will you look like? Who will you be surrounded by? What emotions will you feel?
Visualize twice a day for a total of 10 minutes daily.
It may also be helpful to  that you’ll see daily, or write your desired outcome on an index card and read it right when you wake up and before bed.
